title: MLB 2025 Season |OT| Dodgerball Sports - OT | Page 86 | ResetEra
text: We really got a top prospect for impending free agent Dustin May lmao. we will never stop fleecing the Red Sox We really got a top prospect for impending free agent Dustin May lmao. mlb seriously has the biggest chasm of owners in sports. they're gonna be back to the late 90s era of twins ballThey won a playoff series for the first time in decades, after the team spent money for the first time in decades, and they decided the best path was to cut payroll. Shameful stuff. They're trying to sell the team. I'm not sure that we could do worse than the Pohlads at this point, but if no one would buy the team at $1.7 billion because the payroll was too onerous I'm worried the new ownership will be some fucking broke boys as well.mlb seriously has the biggest chasm of owners in sports. they're gonna be back to the late 90s era of twins ball Braves / Reds bullpen not having a great time in the 8th inning. Game was 3-3 going into the 8th. It is now 11-11 with 1 out in the bottom of the 8th.
